t: VPS+4+6 一键脚本菜单 2025 版 🚀

acs.t:
VPS 脚本 - 其他 2025 🚀

1. IP 检测:
bash <(curl -sL IP.Check.Place)

2. DNS 解锁:
echo "nameserver 154.12.177.22" > /etc/resolv.conf

3. SSL 一键:
curl https://get.acme.sh | sh

4. Reality Xray:
bash <(curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XTLS/Xray-install/main/install-release.sh)

5. CF 优选:
curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yonggekkk/Cloudflare_vless_trojan/main/cf/cf.sh -o cf.sh && bash cf.sh

6. Nezha-Agent:
wget https://github.com/naiba/nezha/releases/latest/download/nezha-agent_linux_amd64.zip && unzip nezha-agent_linux_amd64.zip && ./nezha-agent -s [面板]
